abstracts.cdata!:
The Selebi-Phikwe Technical Assistance
            Project will prmote the economic diversification of the town
            of Selebi-Phikwe and its environs and gradually lessen their
            dependence on the Copper/Nickel Mine of BCL Ltd., which
            ultimately faces closures as ores are exhausted. The project
            will provide technical assistance and other support for
            promotional activities in agriculture and industry,
            including irrigation pilot schemes and the engineering of a
            key link-road. The project will also strengthen
            administration in the urban sector in general through a
            national training program for local government personnel,
            and through technical assistance to the central government
            for urban policy development and implementation.
